dmca.title: Radio DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google: Android Market
dmca.principal_name: Love Radio, Radio Dacha, Taxi FM

works.description:
Our company is owns 3 radio stations
mentioned above, we did not give right to anybody to use our registered
name, logo and exclusive audio content. However we found in GooglePlay
application that uses our logo, and rebroadcasts our audio content. We did
try to contact developer, but on website they have only email address, no
phone, no physical
address. We got no answer to our email. Please remove our stations from
this application.
Thank you in advance.
